snippet: The 16-year-old title character in the coming animated series “Elena of Avalor” lives in a fairy-tale kingdom inspired by Latino cultures and folklore.
abstract: The 16-year-old title character in the coming animated series “Elena of Avalor” lives in a fairy-tale kingdom inspired by Latino cultures and folklore.

headline.main: Disney to Crown Elena, an Animated Latina Princess
headline.print_headline: Disney to Crown a Latina Princess
